Package sailpoint.api

Class DynamicScopeMatchmaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.api.DynamicScopeMatchmaker
  • public class DynamicScopeMatchmaker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class centralizes the business logic that determines if a DynamicScope applies to an Identity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DynamicScopeMatchmaker​(SailPointContext context)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMatches​(Identity identity)
      iterates though the list of dynamic scopes determining what scopes match the user and returns a list of scope id's that match.
      boolean isMatch​(DynamicScope dynamicScope, Identity identity)
      This invokes isMatch(DynamicScope dynamicScope, Identity identity, boolean includeAllSystemAdmins) with includeAllSystemAdmins set to true.
      boolean isMatch​(DynamicScope dynamicScope, Identity identity, boolean includeAllSystemAdmins)
      we evaluate the what scopes are associated with the identity in the following order : return true if the identity has capability SystemAdministrator and includeAllSystemAdmins is true return false if the identity is part of the exclusion list return true if allowAll is set on the dynamic scope return true if the identity is part of the inclusion list return the result of the IdentitySelector if one is defined return false if none of the above evaluate to true
      boolean isMember​(Identity currUser, Identity ident, DynamicScope.PopulationRequestAuthority authority)
      Determine if a given Identity is part of a given PopulationRequestAuthority.

      • isMatch

        public boolean isMatch​(DynamicScope dynamicScope,
                       Identity identity,
                       boolean includeAllSystemAdmins)
                throws GeneralException
        we evaluate the what scopes are associated with the identity in the following order :
        1. return true if the identity has capability SystemAdministrator and includeAllSystemAdmins is true
        2. return false if the identity is part of the exclusion list
        3. return true if allowAll is set on the dynamic scope
        4. return true if the identity is part of the inclusion list
        5. return the result of the IdentitySelector if one is defined
        6. return false if none of the above evaluate to true
        Parameters:
        dynamicScope -
        identity -
        includeAllSystemAdmins - if set to true, this method will return true if the identity has the SystemAdministrator capability (regardless of if they are a member of this DynamicScope). If set to false, this method will only return true if the identity is a member of this DynamicScope.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • isMember

        public boolean isMember​(Identity currUser,
                        Identity ident,
                        DynamicScope.PopulationRequestAuthority authority)
                 throws GeneralException
        Determine if a given Identity is part of a given PopulationRequestAuthority. If currUser is SysAdmin, return true if ident exists
        Parameters:
        currUser - Logged in user
        ident - Identity to test membership
        authority - PopulationRequestAuthority in question
        Returns:
        true if the identity belongs to the PopulationRequestAuthority
        Throws:
        GeneralException
